languages.text: Лорд-капитан, экипаж Святилища Навигатора практичес111ки утратил свет Астр010ономикона. Наш единственный шанс — возврСТРащНОаться по следам своих мыслей и своей боли. Спасите нас — или ведите на смерть, мы последуем за вами в любом случае.

traits.locale_text: Лорд-Капитан, экипаж навигационной палубы практичес111ки утратил свет Астр010ономикона. Наш единственный шанс — возврСТРащНОаться по следам своих мыслей и своей боли. Спасти нас — или ведите на смерть, мы последуем за вами в любом случае.

languages.text: Lord Captain, the crew of the Navigator's Sanctum have virtual111y lost the light of the Astr010onomican. Our only hope is to retrace our sTeRRORps both in our thoughts and in our pain. Save us — or lead us to our deaths, we will follow you no matter what.

languages.text: L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, la tripulación del sanctum de navegantes práct1111camente ha perdido la luz del Astr010nomicón. Nuestra única opción es seguir nuesTERRORros pasos, tanto mentalmente como en cuanto al dolor. Sálvenos o llévenos a la muerte, porque le seguiremos pase lo que pase.
languages.original_text: Lord Captain, the crew of the Navigator's Sanctum have virtual111y lost the light of the Astr010onomican. Our only hope is to retrace our sTeRRORps both in our thoughts and in our pain. Save us — or lead us to our deaths, we will follow you no matter what.

traits.locale_text: L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, la tripulación del sanctum de navegantes práct1111camente ha perdido la luz del Astr010nomicón. Nuestra única opción es seguir nuesTERRORros pasos, tanto mentalmente como en cuanto al dolor. Sálvenos o llévenos a la muerte, porque le seguiremos pase lo que pase.

languages.text: 舰长大人，导航者圣所的船员们已经无法鲡4瑡;#秝追踪星邇?瞼玆炬的光芒。我们唯一的希望，便是在思考与痛苦中，试着返回啺?犼撓?讝来时的位置。拯救我们，或是带领我们走向死亡吧。无论怎样，我们都会追随您。
languages.original_text: Lord Captain, the crew of the Navigator's Sanctum have virtual111y lost the light of the Astr010onomican. Our only hope is to retrace our sTeRRORps both in our thoughts and in our pain. Save us — or lead us to our deaths, we will follow you no matter what.

traits.locale_text: 舰长大人，导航者圣所的船员们已经无法鲡4瑡;#秝追踪星邇?瞼玆炬的光芒。我们唯一的希望，便是在思考与痛苦中，试着返回啺?犼撓?讝来时的位置。拯救我们，或是带领我们走向死亡吧。无论怎样，我们都会追随您。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテン、航宙士のサンクトゥムのクルーはjjj事実上o、ss星辰波hhhの光を失いました。我々の唯一の希望は、知識と体の痛みのどちらも使ってsTeRRORpsを追跡することです。我々をお救いください…もしくは、どうか死へとお導きください。何であってもあなたに従います。
languages.original_text: Lord Captain, the crew of the Navigator's Sanctum have virtual111y lost the light of the Astr010onomican. Our only hope is to retrace our sTeRRORps both in our thoughts and in our pain. Save us — or lead us to our deaths, we will follow you no matter what.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテン、航宙士のサンクトゥムのクルーはjjj事実上o、ss星辰波hhhの光を失いました。我々の唯一の希望は、知識と体の痛みのどちらも使ってsTeRRORpsを追跡することです。我々をお救いください…もしくは、どうか死へとお導きください。何であってもあなたに従います。

languages.text: Herr Kapitän, die Besatzung des Heiligtums des Navigators hat das Licht des Astr010onomican virtuell111y verloren. Unsere einzige Hoffnung ist es, in unseren Gedanken und in unserem Schmerz unsere Wege zurückzuverfolgen. Rette uns — oder führe uns in den Tod, wir werden dir auf jeden Fall folgen.
languages.original_text: Lord Captain, the crew of the Navigator's Sanctum have virtual111y lost the light of the Astr010onomican. Our only hope is to retrace our sTeRRORps both in our thoughts and in our pain. Save us — or lead us to our deaths, we will follow you no matter what.

languages.text: {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les membres d'équipage du sanctum de navigation ont littéral111lement perdu la lumière de l'Astr010onomican. Notre seul espoir est de rebrousseFFROIr chemin, à la fois dans nos pensées et nos tourments. Sauvez-nous, ou menez-nous à la mort... nous vous suivrons quoiqu'il advienne.
languages.original_text: Lord Captain, the crew of the Navigator's Sanctum have virtual111y lost the light of the Astr010onomican. Our only hope is to retrace our sTeRRORps both in our thoughts and in our pain. Save us — or lead us to our deaths, we will follow you no matter what.

Notre seul espoir est de rebrousseFFROIr chemin, à la fois dans nos pensées et nos tourments. Sauvez-nous, ou menez-nous à la mort... nous vous suivrons quoiqu'il advienne.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan, Rotacı'nın Kutağı'ndak111i mürettebat Astro010nomikan'ın ışığını neredeyse kaybetti. Tek umudumuz hem DüşünEHŞETcelerimizde hem de acımızda geçmişe dönmek. Bizi kurtuluşa da ölümümüze de götürseniz sizi takip edeceğiz.
languages.original_text: Lord Captain, the crew of the Navigator's Sanctum have virtual111y lost the light of the Astr010onomican. Our only hope is to retrace our sTeRRORps both in our thoughts and in our pain. Save us — or lead us to our deaths, we will follow you no matter what.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan, Rotacı'nın Kutağı'ndak111i mürettebat Astro010nomikan'ın ışığını kaybetti. Tek umudumuz hem DüşünEHŞETcelerimizin hem de acımızın kökenine inmek. Bizi kurtuluşa da ölümümüze de götürseniz sizi takip edeceğiz.
